tool_description: Enrich your incomplete B2B data with more than 75 exclusive attributes about your prospects and target companies
name: Enrichment B2B - Linkedin - Crunchbase -Datagma
title: Enrichment B2B - Linkedin - Crunchbase -Datagma

api_list.name: Enrich API - Get company & person details
api_list.description: You can enrich an email address, a LinkedIn profile, or a full name with a company name to get info about the person and his company, Or  you can send a company name, website, or SIREN number to get only company info.

required_parameters.name: data
required_parameters.description: You can submit a professional email address or a LinkedIn profile URL to get info about a person and his company. A successful person response costs two credits. You can also submit a company name, a website, or a Siren if you only want information about the company with this parameter. Note: If you don't have an email address or Linkedin Profile, and if you still want information about the person, you can use the couple Full Name + Company Name, see below)

optional_parameters.name: firstName
optional_parameters.description: Replace the data parameter if you don't use it. (Must be used with lastName and company).

optional_parameters.name: personFull
optional_parameters.description: To get the full profile of the person(education, past experiences...).

optional_parameters.name: fullName
optional_parameters.description: Instead of input firstname, lastname. You can input full name here

optional_parameters.name: lastName
optional_parameters.description: Replace the data parameter if you don't use it. (Must be used with firstName and company).

optional_parameters.name: companyFull
optional_parameters.description: To get financial information about the company of the enriched person.

optional_parameters.name: companyPremium
optional_parameters.description: To get the LinkedIn information about the enriched person's company.

optional_parameters.name: debug
optional_parameters.description: By defaut Datagma filters what we consider junk results, thanks to the debug mode, you can access to this junk result

optional_parameters.name: companyFrench
optional_parameters.description: To get the information of the SIREN directory if the company is French.

api_list.name: Find Mobile Phone Number API
api_list.description:
To find the phone number of anybody. Enter any LinkedIn, Facebook, or Twitter Profile URL in the username field.

You can also enrich an email and find its associated mobile phone.

optional_parameters.name: email
optional_parameters.description: Instead of input firstname, lastname. You can input full name here

api_list.name: Job Change API
api_list.description: Detect in real time if one of your contacts has changed company or if he still works in the same company.

required_parameters.name: companyName
required_parameters.description: The last known company for this person

required_parameters.name: lastName
required_parameters.description: The last name of the person whose status you want to check

required_parameters.name: firstName
required_parameters.description: The first name of the person whose status you want to check

optional_parameters.name: jobTitle
optional_parameters.description: If you think that more than one person may have the same name in this company, please do not hesitate to give us the last known job title, so that our AI can choose the right person.

api_list.name: Find Email API
api_list.description: An endpoint to only find email address without any other info. Much faster if you are only looking for email

optional_parameters.name: findEmailV2Country
optional_parameters.description: Config the country to search domain and have accurate result. You can enter any location (city, region) and we will do the rest.

optional_parameters.name: fullName
optional_parameters.description: Instead of input firstname, lastname. You can input full name here

optional_parameters.name: linkedInSlug
optional_parameters.description: Linkedin Company Slug URL, (can be inputed on this format https://www.linkedin.com/company/10625816 or on this format https://www.linkedin.com/company/livestorm/ or on this format https://www.linkedin.com/sales/company/10625816)
